entry.title: markdownË™ûÊ≥ïÁ¥ÄÈåÑ
entry.content:
// how to import
import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Highlight from "@site/src/components/Highlight";
Docusaurus green and Facebook blue are my favorite colors.

I can write Markdown alongside my JSX!

Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.

‚Äî Docusaurus

‰ª•‰∏ãÁÇ∫‰∏äËø∞Áî®Ê≥ïÁöÑÁ®ãÂºèÁ¢º„ÄÇ
<Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight> and <Highlight color="#1877F2">
Facebook blue
</Highlight> are my favorite colors.

I can write **Markdown** alongside my _JSX_!

> Easy to maintain open source documentation websites.
>
> ‚Äî Docusaurus

Details element example‚Äã

Toggle me!
This is the detailed content

Nested toggle! Some surprise inside...
üò≤üò≤üò≤üò≤üò≤
<details>
  <summary>Toggle me!</summary>
  <div>
    <div>This is the detailed content</div>
    <br />
    <details>
      <summary>Nested toggle! Some surprise inside...</summary>
      <div>üò≤üò≤üò≤üò≤üò≤</div>
    </details>
  </div>
</details>
how to import img
<>
  <div style={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "center" }}>
    <img
      src={require("./malta_street.jpeg").default}
      style={{ width: "50%" }}
      alt="malta_street png"
    />
  </div>
</>

My Doc Section‚Äã

Hello world message with some bold text, some italic text, and a link

//demo bold text ,italic style and superlink
Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text, and a [link](https://www.yahoo.com)
  • Apple
  • Orange
  • Banana
This is an apple üçé
This is an orange üçä
This is a banana üçå
  • Android
  • iOS
Android
iOS
demo tabs and tabs bring query string
// here are just tabs
<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="apple" label="Apple" default>
    This is an apple üçé
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="orange" label="Orange">
    This is an orange üçä
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="banana" label="Banana">
    This is a banana üçå
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

//here bring query string
<Tabs groupId="current-os" queryString>
  <TabItem value="android" label="Android">
    Android
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="ios" label="iOS">
    iOS
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
/src/components/HelloCodeTitle.js
function HelloCodeTitle(props) {
  return <h1>Hello, {props.name}</h1>;
}
```jsx title="/src/components/HelloCodeTitle.js"
function HelloCodeTitle(props) {
  return <h1>Hello, {props.name}</h1>;
}
```
import React from "react";

const MyComponent = (props) => {
  if (props.isBar) {
    return <div>Bar</div>;
  }

  return <div>Foo</div>;
};

export default MyComponent;
```jsx {1,4-6,11}
import React from "react";

const MyComponent = (props) => {
  if (props.isBar) {
    return <div>Bar</div>;
  }

  return <div>Foo</div>;
};

export default MyComponent;
```
Live Editor
// need install jsx live
function Clock(props) {
  const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());
  useEffect(() => {
    const timerID = setInterval(() => tick(), 1000);


    return function cleanup() {
      clearInterval(timerID);
    };
  });


  function tick() {
    setDate(new Date());
  }


  return (
    <div>
      <h2>It is {date.toLocaleTimeString()}.</h2>
    </div>
  );
}
Result
Loading...
```jsx live
// need install jsx live
function Clock(props) {
  const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());
  useEffect(() => {
    const timerID = setInterval(() => tick(), 1000);

    return function cleanup() {
      clearInterval(timerID);
    };
  });

  function tick() {
    setDate(new Date());
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <h2>It is {date.toLocaleTimeString()}.</h2>
    </div>
  );
}
```

  {Object.entries(frontMatter).map(([key, value]) => (
    <li key={key}>
      <b>{key}</b>: {value}
    </li>
  ))}
</ul>

ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî® git push --force,Âü∫Êú¨‰∏ä main branch ÈÉΩÊúÉÊòØ‰øùË≠∑ÁöÑÔºå ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ËÄÉÊÖÆÁî® pull request ÂÖàÈÄ≤Ë°åÊ∏¨Ë©¶„ÄÇÈÅé‰∫ÜÂÜç merge

git checkout master
git reset --hard e3f1e37
git push --force origin master
# Then to prove it (it won't print any diff)
git diff master..origin/master

entry.title: Âú®docusaurus‰ΩøÁî®google fontÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï
entry.content:
‰∏Ä„ÄÅ‰∏ÄËà¨ css import‚Äã

1.Âú® html head import‚Äã


<head>

<style>
body {
  font-family: "Sofia", sans-serif;
}
</style>
</head>

2.Âú® css import‚Äã

scr/css/custom.css
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Caveat:wght@500&display=swap");
// cssÈÅ∏ÊìáÂô®ÈÅ∏‰ΩøÁî®ÁØÑÂúç

    font-size: 30px;
    font-family: Caveat;
  }

// css ÈÅ∏ÊìáÊ®ôÁ§∫Áî®ÈÄóËôüÂàÜÈöî

  font-family: Noto Sans TC, sans-serif;
}

‰∫å„ÄÅÂú® docusaurus ‰ΩøÁî®‚Äã

1.Âú® html head import‚Äã

ÈÄôÂÄãÊñπÊ≥ïÁõ∏Áï∂Êñº‰∏ÄËà¨ css ‰ΩøÁî®Âú® head Êâì linkÔºåÂè™ÊòØÂØ´Âú®Ë®≠ÂÆöÊ™îÂÖßÔºåÊúÉÊñºÁ∑®Ë≠ØÂæåÁî¢ÁîüÂú® index.html ÁöÑ head Ë£°Èù¢

        theme: {
          customCss: require.resolve("./src/css/custom.css"),
        },
      },

      rel: "preconnect",

    },
  ],
